alert.note: Alert for Butte; Lawrence; Meade (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 11 at 8:04PM MDT until June 11 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 900 PM MDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN BUTTE...WESTERN MEADE...NORTH CENTRAL LAWRENCE AND NORTHEASTERN CROOK COUNTIES... At 804 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 3 miles southeast of Colony, or 17 miles northwest of Belle Fourche, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Belle Fourche, Newell, Nisland, Vale, Colony, Fruitdale, Arpan, Belle Fourche Reservoir and Newell Lake. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare immediately for large hail and damaging winds. People outside should move to a shelter, inside a strong building and away from windows.
